ygData.subject: Re: [Re: Somethin seems wrong (long response)]
ygData.msgSnippet: Now that is a very intersting idea. A couple of more thoughts, how about sword and shield molds as well with similiar qualities? Hell how about just some sword
ygData.messageBody:
Now that is a very intersting idea. A couple of more thoughts, how about
sword and shield molds as well with similiar qualities? Hell how about just
some sword and shield molds. :)
----- Original Message -----
From: Dennis Meek <dmeek01@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 6:10 AM
Subject: Re: [Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Somethin seems wrong (long response)]


> From: "Dennis Meek" <dmeek01@...>
>
> About being able to enchant sheet metal for armor....
>
> Yes, I love the idea. I think it would be great to get some kick ass
armor
> like that! But then....it wouldn't be fair. Think about it. Enchanters
> already are the best at Jewelry Making. It is (pretty much) damn foolish
> for anyone BUT an enchanter to learn the skill. Unless, of course, you
also
> play a high lvl enchanter who you use for your own enchanted metals.
>
> By giving enchanters the ability to enchant sheet metal, thereby creating
> magical armor, this make's enchanters have far too much control over the
> market. Jewelry making and Blacksmithing all would depend upon
enchanters?
> No, I'd rather not have that.
>
> Besides, Magical Armor should be something special. IMHO, I believe there
> should be quests for Blacksmith's, where the reward might be a mold that
> comes enchanted with some random quality. This would allow EVERYone the
> opportunity to do this, and make us not be dependant upon enchanters.
>
> What do you all think?
>
> Haijar the Mage Blacksmith
>
>
